snippet: Sara Moreira of Portugal won the women’s 3,000 meters at the European Indoor Athletics Championships in Goteborg, Sweden.
abstract: Bronxville, NY, teenager Mary Cain wins women’s mile at United States indoor track and field championships, becoming first high school student to win national indoor or outdoor championship since 2003.
lead_paragraph: Sara Moreira of Portugal won the women’s 3,000 meters at the European Indoor Athletics Championships in Goteborg, Sweden.

headline.seo: Sara Moreira Dominates 3,000 Meters at European Indoors
headline.main: Moreira Dominates 3,000 Meters at European Indoors
